title: Asking about grades
context: Politely ask an instructor how you performed on a specific test.

content.bestLine: Could you tell me how I did on the test?

neutral.text: How did I perform on the test?
What was my score on the exam?
Can you share my test results?
How many points did I get on the test?
What was my grade on the assignment?
Can I get my test score from you?
How did I do on the recent test?
Can you tell me my current grade?

formal.text: I would appreciate it if you could inform me of my test results.
Could you please provide me with my grade on the exam?
I would like to request my test score, if possible.
May I inquire about my performance on the recent test?
I would be grateful if you could share my test results with me.
Could you kindly inform me of my current grade?

patterns.template: Could you tell me how I did on the [test/assignment/exam]?
I would like to know my [score/grade/results] on the [test/assignment/exam].

dialogs.description: Student asking instructor about test results

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: Excuse me, professor. Could you tell me how I did on the test?

lines.speaker: Instructor
lines.text: Let me check. Ah yes, you scored an 85%. Good job!

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: Hi professor, I was wondering if you could tell me my current grade in the class?

lines.speaker: Instructor
lines.text: Of course. You're currently at a B+, but that could change depending on your performance on the final exam.
